content:
Hello Coders:

This one is a softball, but when I am
running the groupby clause on a data
frame, I am returning unique values
for all column values except one.

The output is similar to the following:

City | Value1_median | Value 2_median
B | 11.2 | 20.1
A | 9.8 | 20.1
C | 3.4 | 20.1
D | 65.2 | 20.1

I am using a formula similar to: 

Out1 =  combine(GroupedDF, :Value1 => median, :Value2 => median)

Any suggestions?
